body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Murphy & Co. Security Services. My name is Patrick Murphy. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Martha. For security verification purposes, could you provide me with the first three digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. And could you also tell me the last two digits of your home address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you for confirming that information, Martha. Is there anything specific you need help with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling surprised by a recent incident at the Car Dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how that can be concerning. We'll do our best to assist you with this situation. Thank you for sharing your concerns, Martha. We will look into this matter further. If you have any additional details to share, feel free to let us know.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today, Martha. We appreciate your cooperation. Have a great day.
